casebody.data:
Deborah Lynn FOSTER, Plaintiff/Counter-Defendant-Appellee,
v.
Ray James FOSTER, Defendant/Counter-Plaintiff-Appellant. SC: 157705
COA: 324853 Supreme Court of Michigan. June 11, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff/counter-defendant-appellee to extend the time for filing her answer to the application for leave to appeal is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before June 28, 2018.
